greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(0)=1, a(1)=0, a(2)=1, a(3)=1, a(n) = a(n-1) + a(n-2) - a(n-3) for n > 3.
comment: Diagonal sums of triangle A123110. - _Philippe Deléham_, Oct 08 2009
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,1,-1).
